<gallery>
File:Herpes LISA.jpeg|Genital herpes: painful postvesicular millimetric lesions with an inflammatory border of the glans.
</gallery>

properties.question: What is the characteristic appearance of genital herpes lesions as seen in the provided photograph?
properties.option_a: Millimetric lesions with a smooth, flat surface and central clearing
properties.option_b: Painful postvesicular lesions with an inflammatory border of the glans
properties.option_c: Small, clustered vesicles filled with clear fluid on an erythematous base
properties.option_d: Painless, singular, large ulcerative lesion with a yellowish discharge
